mapper.select: SELECT storage_id, storage_code, storage_name, ifnull(storage_address,"") as storage_address, (CASE WHEN storage_type = 0 THEN '작물연구동' WHEN storage_type = 1 THEN '가공이용연구동' WHEN storage_type = 2 THEN '연천시험지' WHEN storage_type = 3 THEN '외부포장' END) AS storage_type_name, storage_division, storage_size, storage_location, create_date, modify_date, storage_status, user_id, storage_unit, s.depart_id, ifnull(department, "") as department, depart_depth, depart_parents, ifnull(storage_contents,"")as storage_contents FROM storage s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.depart_id = d.depart_id ORDER BY storage_id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT * FROM storage ORDER BY storage_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storage (storage_code, storage_name, storage_type, storage_division, storage_size, depart_id, storage_location, create_date, modify_date, user_id) VALUES (#{storage_code}, #{storage_name}, #{storage_type}, #{storage_division}, #{storage_size}, #{depart_id}, #{storage_location}, NOW(), NOW(), 0)
